9 #include "calculator/losses/ExhaustGasEAF.h"

11 double ExhaustGasEAF::getTotalHeatExhaust() {
12  const double COheatingValue = CO * 321 / 100;
13  const double H2heatingValue = H2 * 325 / 100;
14  const double combustibles = combustibleGases * 1020 / 100;
15  const double chemicalHeat = COheatingValue + H2heatingValue + combustibles;
16 
17  const double sensibleHeat = 0.0225 * (offGasTemp - 60);
18  const double heatInDust = dustLoading * 0.25 * (offGasTemp - 60);
19  const double totalHeatFlue = chemicalHeat + sensibleHeat + heatInDust;
20  const double totalVfr = vfr * 520 / (460 + offGasTemp);
21  return totalVfr * totalHeatFlue * 60;
22 }
